abstract: Why did an image of Omran rocket around the world — especially when other images from the war have not been able to grab the rest of the world’s attention?
snippet: Why did an image of Omran rocket around the world — especially when other images from the war have not been able to grab the rest of the world’s attention?...

headline.main: Article of the Day | ‘How Omran Daqneesh, 5, Became a Symbol of Aleppo’s Suffering’
